titles.title: A resolution providing for concurring in the Senate amendment to H.R. 2266, to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 and the Hazardous Liquid Pipeline Safety Act of 1979 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989, and for other purposes, with an amendment.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 2266 (pipeline safety), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment with an amendment.
